title: Our inspiration, Thelma A. Meyer, talks about “Perfection”
description: Thelma A. Meyer, the inspiration and namesake behind the Mrs. Meyer’s brand, shares her thoughts on challenging the idea of perfection, the importance of not giving up, and encourages everyone to “just keep making” in this handcrafted short film. To find out more visit our website and remember if what you make doesn’t turn out perfect, perfect. The fun is in the making. We also think it’s in the cleaning but that’s kind of our thing. Share your perfectly imperfect creations with #MakeAndTell.

asset.author: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day
